title: Teacher Medium Skin Tone
description: A person, typically depicted with glasses and holding a book or pointer, representing a teacher. The medium skin tone modifier indicates a specific skin color.
apple_vendor_description: On Apple devices, the teacher with a medium skin tone emoji conveys a sense of wisdom and guidance through its gentle, approachable depiction.  Rendered with Apple's signature smooth gradients and soft rounded edges, this figure appears poised and knowledgeable, often seen holding a book or pointer. The realistic lighting highlights a friendly, encouraging expression, making it a perfect symbol for education, learning, or offering advice in digital conversations.
